Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.gui.guiControllers

Class PlayingBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObserver
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.gui.guiControllers.PlayingBoardController
public class PlayingBoardController extends ModelObserver
The controller for the PlayingBoard view Uses ModelObserver to be updated with the ViewModelState

  • Method Details

    • setStarterCardSide

      public static void setStarterCardSide(CardSide starterCardSide)
      Static method to set the initial card on the playerBoard, used by the SelectStarterCardController
      Parameters:
      starterCardSide - the card side of the starter card

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Default initialization method. Called every time the FXML view is shown. FXML playing-board.fxml Initialize all board with data present on ViewModelState

    • cardSelection

      public void cardSelection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method used to manage the currently selected card and side
      Parameters:
      event - The event bound with the click of one of the 3 player's hand card playerCard1 playerCard2 playerCard3

    • setSelectedCardSide

      public void setSelectedCardSide(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method used to change the side of the selected card
      Parameters:
      event - The event of click on card, if the card clicked is already selected then the selectedCardSide will be toggled

    • setSelected

      public void setSelected(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Set the selected card. If the card is the same nothing is done
      Parameters:
      event - The click event on the card

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int column, int row, javafx.scene.image.ImageView newCard)
      Method used to add one card image to the playingBoardGrid
      Parameters:
      column - the column of the board slot in which place the card
      row - the row of the boardSlot in which place the card
      newCard - the image of the card placed

    • placeCardServer

      public void placeCardServer(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method bound to every new card placed. Fires the placeCard on server side via ClientConnection.placeCard(int, CardSide, BoardSlot) Gets the new boardSlot from the click event and the card to place is the currently selected After execution reset the selected card
      Parameters:
      event - The click event on one particular card

    • getCorner

      public CornerLocation getCorner(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method used to get the relative location of the board with respect to the selected corner
      Parameters:
      event - the click event on the corner
      Returns:
      the relative location of the boardSlot

    • pickupCard

      public void pickupCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method used to pick up a card. If the turn is correct it triggers the pickup on server if it is the second time clicking the same card
      Parameters:
      event - The event bounded to all possible drawable cards visibleGoldCard1 visibleGoldCard2 goldCardsDeck resourceCardsDeck visibleResourceCard2 visibleResourceCard2

    • setPickedCard

      public void setPickedCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method needed to add double-click picking If the card is clicked for the second time nothing happens, otherwise it is selected
      Parameters:
      event - The event on one of the drawable cards.

    • pickUpCardServer

      public void pickUpCardServer(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method to fire the draw or take card on server side via ClientConnection.drawCard(DrawType) or ClientConnection.takeCard(int, DrawType) Gets the type of draw from the input event After execution reset the picked card
      Parameters:
      event - The click event on one particular drawable card

    • setPlayerCards

      public void setPlayerCards()
      Method to show the correct Image for all cards in player hand

    • setVisibleGoldCards

      public void setVisibleGoldCards()
      Method to set the image of the visible gold cards

    • setVisibleResourceCards

      public void setVisibleResourceCards()
      Method to set the image of the visible resource cards

      private void setVisibleDecks()
      Method to set the visible top card on decks

      public void setCommonObjectives()
      Method to set the correct image on common objectives

    • setSecretObjective

      public void setSecretObjective()
      Method to set the correct image on secret objective

    • setScoringBoard

      public void setScoringBoard()
      Method to update the Scoring Board and the plateau

    • openOpponentBoard

      private void openOpponentBoard(String nickname) throws IOException
      Method bound to "ShowBoard" button to open the board of an opponent
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the opponent board
      Throws:
      IOException - if it is impossible to load the fxml

    • toggleChat

      private void toggleChat()
      Method bound to "Chat" button, used to open the chat Modal
